Class Enums

Class holding all Enum used in CSSP applications and methods used to get text associated with the Enum in both languages [en, fr]

  • CSSPServices

| Improve this Doc View Source

Enums(LanguageEnum)

using LanguageEnum.en

CurrentCulture = new CultureInfo("en-CA");

CurrentUICulture = new CultureInfo("en-CA");

using LanguageEnum.fr

CurrentCulture = new CultureInfo("fr-CA");

CurrentUICulture = new CultureInfo("fr-CA");

Declaration
public Enums(LanguageEnum LanguageRequest)
Parameters
Type Name Description
LanguageEnum LanguageRequest

The language to use when getting the text of the enumerations
Examples

Enums enums = new Enums(LanguageEnum.en) or Enums enums = new Enums(LanguageEnum.fr)
